requirements.summary: Remove the admin panel button from the student Dashboard page so it is no longer visible or accessible to any user
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Admin Panel' button/link is no longer rendered on the Dashboard page.
No visual reference to the admin panel exists on the Dashboard page.

file_operations.description: Remove the admin panel button and associated conditional rendering logic that displays it for admin users. Remove any imports or state related to admin panel navigation.

requirements.summary: Remove the admin dropdown menu from the Header component so admin navigation links are not shown in the top navigation bar
acceptanceCriteria: The admin dropdown menu is no longer rendered in the Header.
No admin-related navigation links are visible in the top navigation bar for any user.

file_operations.description: Remove the admin dropdown menu component and all associated navigation links to admin routes. Remove any conditional rendering logic for admin users and related imports.

requirements.summary: Remove the admin routes from the TanStack Router configuration so admin pages are not reachable via URL
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to any /admin/* URL results in a redirect or 404, not an admin page.
No admin routes are registered in the router configuration.

file_operations.description: Remove all admin route registrations including /admin, /admin/dashboard, /admin/content, /admin/users, and any other /admin/* routes from the TanStack Router configuration. Remove admin page imports that are no longer needed.

requirements.summary: Remove the admin panel link/button from the Login page so that after login, admin users are not redirected to the admin panel
acceptanceCriteria: After login, all users (including admins) are redirected to the standard dashboard.
No admin-specific redirect logic exists on the Login page.

file_operations.description: Remove admin-specific redirect logic that sends admin users to the admin panel after login. Ensure all users are redirected to the standard dashboard route regardless of role.
